In addition, thanks for your invaluable contribution & dedication over the years Mister SOULKING77. There is no exercise better for the heart than reaching down and lifting people up.

@ mnmarco - I must thank you for providing the link. However I have found every single application but could not manage to find the Webcam Driver. I did manage to install an Acer Cam driver but the video is upside down. Once again thank you so much and god bless you. In case if you find a diver related to it then please provide me with link.

@ Thanks Mister gthol, however it was of no avail. I have almost tried all Acer Webcam drivers, I do not have problems with either the quality of the video and also no malfunctioning. The problems that I am facing is either the video is upside down or the video position changed. Few months ago I did used a driver or software that actually did allowed to me to change the positions and angles, but now I could not find and do not remember the file.
